channel.title: 法新社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪法新社news的种子

item.title: #BREAKING 分离的摩尔多瓦地区德涅斯特河左岸请求俄罗斯 "保护 "#BREAKING 分离的摩尔多瓦地区德涅斯特河左岸请求俄罗斯 "保护 "#BREAKING
item.description:
#BREAKING Breakaway Moldovan region of Transnistria asks Russia for 'protection' pic.twitter.com/enQJnHrBFX

item.title: 视频：为重振低迷的房地产市场，香港取消了三大房地产交易税，推翻了十多年前为抑制投机和控制高房价而推出的措施。
item.description:
VIDEO: Hong Kong has axed three major property transaction taxes in a bid to revive its depressed housing market, reversing measures introduced more than a decade ago to curb speculation and rein in sky-high prices. pic.twitter.com/0NiN82LVKY

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 28, 2024

item.title: 哈里王子周三在法庭上因英国政府决定改变他访问该国时的个人安全级别而败诉。
item.description:
Prince Harry lost a court challenge against the UK government on Wednesday over a decision to change the level of his personal security when he visits the country.https://t.co/Tsc1Ctpbn7

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 28, 2024

item.title: 法国政府计划将堕胎 "自由 "写入宪法，该计划将于周三在右派占主导地位的参议院进行关键性投票。
item.description:
A French government plan to enshrine the "freedom" to have an abortion in the constitution is to be tested Wednesday in a crucial vote in the right-dominated Senate.https://t.co/OkOT0gr0FJ

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 28, 2024

item.title: 视频：加拿大城市蒙特利尔正经历着近乎夏天般的酷热，气温高达 15 摄氏度，尽管冬天尚未过去。
item.description:
VIDEO: The Canadian city of Montreal is experiencing almost summer-like heat, with temperatures hitting 15 degrees Celsius, even though winter is not yet over. pic.twitter.com/sBPXvDxtWw

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 28, 2024

item.title: 视频：印有国王查理三世头像的新纸币和硬币在伦敦英格兰银行博物馆展出。
item.description:
VIDEO: New banknotes and coins bearing the image of King Charles III are on display at the Bank of England museum in London. pic.twitter.com/uMktsMWpiz

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 28, 2024

item.title: 视频：在黎巴嫩南部边境，真主党和以色列几乎每天都在交火，数百名黎巴嫩人在贝鲁特北部的一个豪华滑雪胜地的纯白斜坡上滑行，他们急切地想从加沙战争的新闻中解脱出来。
item.description:
VIDEO: Hundreds of Lebanese glide on pristine white slopes at a luxury ski resort north of Beirut, eager to disconnect from news of the war in Gaza as Hezbollah and Israel exchange near-daily fire on Lebanon's southern border. pic.twitter.com/iQ7OOdhgbP

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 28, 2024

item.title: 视频：一只西伯利亚虎在哥本哈根动物园诞生，为保护濒临灭绝的大型猫科动物做出了贡献。据该动物园称，目前仅有 500 只这种珍稀老虎生活在野外，主要分布在俄罗斯远东地区、中国东北地区，可能还有朝鲜。
item.description:
VIDEO: A Siberian tiger has been born at Copenhagen Zoo, in a boost to conservation efforts for the endangered big cats. According to the zoo, barely 500 of these rare tigers still live in the wild, mainly in the Russian Far East, northeast China and possibly North Korea. pic.twitter.com/wZnK7ACgmW

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 28, 2024

item.title: #伊拉克 - 石油泄漏给伊拉克农民带来巨大压力。
item.description:
#Iraq - Oil spills pile on pressure for Iraq's farmers.
📸Abdel Khaleq AL-SAMARRAI / AFP pic.twitter.com/ylnsbp3hsZ

— AFP Photo (@AFPphoto) February 28, 2024

item.title: 26 位英格兰教会的主教和大主教自动进入上议院，这是一个未经选举产生的上议院，这项拥有数百年历史的权利激怒了民主运动人士和世俗主义者。
item.description:
God-given vote: the bishops in the UK parliament.

Twenty-six Church of England bishops and archbishops automatically sit in the House of Lords, the unelected upper chamber, a centuries-old right that angers democracy campaigners and secularistshttps://t.co/n0wDqNK0gw pic.twitter.com/9AK4uARhdJ

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 28, 2024

item.title: 视频： 尽管冬季尚未结束，但加拿大城市蒙特利尔正经历着近似夏季的高温，气温高达 15 摄氏度。
item.description:
VIDEO: Record-breaking heat in winter.

The Canadian city of Montreal is experiencing almost summer-like heat, with temperatures hitting 15 degrees Celsius, even though winter is not yet over pic.twitter.com/kzTJjl32pj

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 28, 2024

item.title: 联合国开始从刚果民主共和国撤出联刚稳定团维和部队

United Nations to kick off the withdrawal of MONUSCO peacekeeping forces from the Democratic Republic of Congo https://t.co/lVS2vOmy39 pic.twitter.com/omQhOJDKxz

item.title: 视频： 本周三，英国将首次向公众展示印有国王查理三世头像的纸币。
item.description:
VIDEO: People in the United Kingdom can get their first glimpse on Wednesday of banknotes bearing King Charles III's image.

They will be revealed to the public at the opening of the Bank of England's "The Future of Money" exhibitionhttps://t.co/KMNt6trOxU pic.twitter.com/FfL3AdciZJ

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 28, 2024

item.title: 据美国媒体报道，苹果公司已放弃生产电动汽车的野心，结束了长达十年的挣扎项目
item.description:
Apple has abandoned its ambitions to produce an electric car, US media report, ending a struggling decade-long projecthttps://t.co/gjCtY218w5

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 28, 2024

item.title: 视频：在以色列占领的约旦河西岸城镇比尔宰特（Birzeit）的巴勒斯坦博物馆里，加沙的艺术和遗产正在展出，作为声援饱受战争蹂躏的沿海地区的 "持续艺术展示"。
item.description:
VIDEO: West Bank museum showcases Gaza art in protest at Israel-Hamas war.

At the Palestinian Museum in the Israeli-occupied West Bank town of Birzeit, Gaza's art and heritage is on display as an "ongoing artistic demonstration" in solidarity with the war-ravaged coastal… pic.twitter.com/aFnCQwe4Ns

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 28, 2024

item.title: 希腊最严重的火车事故造成57人死亡，数十人受伤，一年后的周三，希腊全国各地的工人将举行罢工，要求给出答案。
item.description:
Workers across Greece are set to strike on Wednesday to demand answers a year after the nation's deadliest train crash, which killed 57 people and injured dozens morehttps://t.co/0uJFvpivDH pic.twitter.com/AVesq9ngBG

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 28, 2024

item.title: "需要我提醒你吗，007，你有杀人执照，而不是违反交通法规。"@AFP摄影师Mandel Ngan参观了华盛顿特区国际间谍博物馆的 "邦德在行动 "展览。该展览重点展示了詹姆斯-邦德电影中使用的车辆，...
item.description:
"Need I Remind You, 007, That You Have A License To Kill, Not To Break The Traffic Laws."@AFP photographer Mandel Ngan visits the "Bond in Motion" exhibition at the International Spy Museum in Washington, DC. The exhibit, which highlights vehicles used in James Bond movies,… pic.twitter.com/yVMzPONW8k

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 28, 2024

item.title: 19 世纪，得克萨斯州曾是墨西哥的一部分。在经历了一场独立战争--所谓的德克萨斯革命之后，德克萨斯于 1836 年获得了主权地位。九年后，它加入了美国
item.description:
With 'Texit,' some want to make Texas a country, again.

In the 19th century, Texas was part of Mexico. After a war of independence - the so-called Texas Revolution - it achieved sovereign status in 1836. Nine years later it joined the United Stateshttps://t.co/5r2jq3PtYg pic.twitter.com/i8azt6AyBX

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 28, 2024

item.title: 2024 年 2 月 27 日，纽约曼哈顿第一大道下着瓢泼大雨，行人和车辆在雨中穿梭。
item.description:
Red rain.@AFP photographer Charly Triballeau captures pedestrians and cars moving along First Avenue in the Manhattan borough of New York, in the pouring rain, on February 27, 2024 pic.twitter.com/WLY0hrleym

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 28, 2024

item.title: 视频： 罗马圣彼得大教堂的天幕距上次修复已有 250 多年的历史，目前正在进行大修，为 2025 年的世界大庆做准备，届时将有 3000 多万朝圣者前来参观。
item.description:
VIDEO: Canopy of St Peter's Basilica to be restored ahead of Jubilee.

More than 250 years since its last restoration, the Canopy of St Peter's Basilica in Rome is undergoing major works in preparation for the World Jubilee in 2025, when more than 30 million pilgrims are… pic.twitter.com/MpmPgFWK0Y

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 28, 2024

item.title: 韩国的出生率降至历史最低水平。韩国是世界上预期寿命最长、出生率最低的国家之一，这一组合带来了迫在眉睫的人口挑战。
item.description:
South Korea birth rate falls to all-time low.

The country has one of the world's longest life expectancies and lowest birth rates, a combination that presents a looming demographic challengehttps://t.co/k6BLqg0mJs pic.twitter.com/u6KdHnmE0b

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 28, 2024

item.title: 乔-拜登在密歇根州总统初选中轻松获胜，尽管有人对他处理加沙战争的方式投了抗议票
item.description:
Joe Biden cruises to easy victory in Michigan's presidential primary despite protest vote over his handling of the war in Gaza https://t.co/VcEldulnaz pic.twitter.com/MhuPGzij8F

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 28, 2024

item.title: 巴黎奥运会安保计划从火车上偷走了。奥运会期间将部署两千名市政警察，预计在 7 月 26 日开幕的奥运会期间，每天将有大约 35,000 名安保人员执勤。
item.description:
Paris Olympics security plans stolen from train.

Two thousand municipal police officers will be deployed during the Games, with a total of around 35,000 security forces expected to be on duty each day for the Olympics that start on July 26https://t.co/2Y9cxPwo47 pic.twitter.com/1ru0eJ9b21

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 28, 2024

item.title: 视频： 据哥本哈根动物园称，目前仅有 500 只珍稀的西伯利亚虎生活在野外，主要分布在俄罗斯远东地区、中国东北地区，可能还有朝鲜。
item.description:
VIDEO: Rare baby Siberian tiger born at Copenhagen Zoo.

According to the zoo, barely 500 of these rare tigers still live in the wild, mainly in the Russian Far East, northeast China and possibly North Korea pic.twitter.com/MqRCw7yceM

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 28, 2024

item.title: 新研究发现，北太平洋座头鲸的数量在不到十年的时间里锐减了 20%。
item.description:
Number of North Pacific humpback whales has plummeted 20% in less than a decade.

Marine heatwaves may be the main culprit, new study sayshttps://t.co/U2x7krWE7s pic.twitter.com/FsWZB0tIFe

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 28, 2024

item.title: 在巴黎时装周上，两位时尚界的重量级人物回顾了 20 世纪 60 年代，克里斯汀-迪奥（Christian Dior）向革命性的 "迪奥小姐 "系列致敬，而圣罗兰（Saint Laurent）则围绕其创始人钟爱的透明薄纱服装打造了一个系列。
item.description:
Two fashion heavyweights looked back to the 1960s at Paris Fashion Week, with Christian Dior paying homage to the revolutionary "Miss Dior" line and Saint Laurent building a collection around the transparent sheer outfits beloved of its founder.https://t.co/DtMO4ni7Go pic.twitter.com/hRnCZWz57s

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 28, 2024

item.title: 美国的一个月球着陆器在上周的历史性着陆过程中翻倒，运营该着陆器的私营公司说，它的电池可能只剩下几个小时就会耗尽。
item.description:
An American lunar lander that tipped over during its historic touchdown last week likely only has hours left until its battery runs out, the private company operating it said.https://t.co/TFnIlappk8

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 28, 2024

item.title: 整整 31 年前，在波斯尼亚的 Strpci 村，枪手强迫 20 名平民下了火车。他们遭到殴打、抢劫，随后被杀害。
item.description:
Exactly 31 years ago, gunmen forced 20 civilians off a train in the Bosnian village of Strpci. They were beaten, robbed and later murdered.https://t.co/zQKfy8xLQK pic.twitter.com/euFRL0Hi0n

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 28, 2024

item.title: 周五，伊朗人民将前往投票站参加立法选举和其他选举，候选人在竞选海报上向他们承诺将打击腐败和整顿经济。
item.description:
As Iranians head to the polls for legislative and other elections on Friday, candidates have promised them on campaign posters to fight corruption and fix the economy.https://t.co/9zzk9h3GZb

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 27, 2024

item.title: 莫斯科在世界各地招募人员的帮助下，为驻乌克兰的俄罗斯军队雇用了一批印度国民，其中包括一名苹果种植农、一名航空餐饮服务员和一名失业毕业生。
item.description:
An apple farmer, an airline caterer and an out-of-work graduate are among the Indian nationals hired by Moscow, with the help of recruiters around the world, for the Russian army in Ukraine.https://t.co/ol7UkTT6IT pic.twitter.com/0wqMIQV9SU

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 27, 2024
